mapper.insert: insert into inventory_carry_over (inventory_carry_over_id, carry_over_employee_code, carry_over_employee_name, carry_over_date, inventory_id) values (#{inventory_carry_over_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carry_over_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carry_over_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carry_over_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inventory_id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select inventory_carry_over_id, carry_over_employee_code, carry_over_employee_name, carry_over_date, inventory_id from inventory_carry_over where inventory_carry_over_id = #{inventory_carry_over_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select inventory_carry_over_id, carry_over_employee_code, carry_over_employee_name, carry_over_date, inventory_id from inventory_carry_over
